long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the user to generate a specific anti-collision report from DrillPlan.
The user only needs to be a DELFI registered user and access a DrillPlan training tenant with at least one active subscription (DrillPlan Guest or DrillPlan- Plus). 
You can install this extension if you are a Well Planner or drilling Engineer who wants to generate this report
